Tipene Funerals scandal: Fiona Bakulich named as Auckland undertaker accused of mishandling bodies https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-scandal-fiona-bakulich-named-as-auckland-undertaker-accused-of-mishandling-bodies/I2FMDB367FFIZFRPFJXNMJGHAQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-scandal-fiona-bakulich-named-as-auckland-undertaker-accused-of-mishandling-bodies/I2FMDB367FFIZFRPFJXNMJGHAQ/ Raphael FranksBakulich is accused of putting dead bodies in plastic bags instead of coffins paid for. Wed, 30 Oct 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Fiona Bakulich can now be named as the ex-Tipene Funerals undertaker before the court on allegations of misconduct with her grieving clients’ dead relatives and duping them out of extra cash payments. Photo / Michael Craig

Cannabis busts in Auckland: Police arrest 11 Vietnamese nationals, seize more than 3000 plants https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cannabis-busts-in-auckland-police-arrest-11-vietnamese-nationals-seize-more-than-3000-plants/TUHSFTXXRZHGDGCTP2IR66BIOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cannabis-busts-in-auckland-police-arrest-11-vietnamese-nationals-seize-more-than-3000-plants/TUHSFTXXRZHGDGCTP2IR66BIOM/ Benjamin PlummerThe 11 arrested were all Vietnamese nationals who have since been deported.
